data.text: Not worth having anymore. Was really great to have when u first downloaded it a few years ago. Now it takes forever to load and has locked me out. When you call to reset your account, you get the run around. 03/01/2024 update: The gas since improved drastically. The presentation is simple but functional. An the added features expand how the app can be used. Less glitches

This app is so much more than just an EBT card balance. It has so much more, and it's so easy to use. I'm so glad I downloaded it!! Edit 3-8-2024 I got a new EBT card due to unseen issues and I can't load it in the app. And absolutely no one will help me fix the issue!!! I have written to absolutely everyone who could possibly help me with fixing this issue and no body has or will. New rating is **

Great app with getting information for resources. Sometimes, the app won't connect, but it rarely happens. I had to get a replacement card, and it was easy to remove the old and add the new. However, I did like the old version more because it showed me when my deposit came in and how much.

This app was a wonderful utility at first. But lately, it has been extremely slow to load. And once you do get it to load, it more often than not says that it is unable to connect to your record. BUT NOW, when it loads it says, "APP COULDN'T LOAD" and some extremely amateurish link displaying SEND INFO. You guys are making me afraid to use your app with all the hacking going on. PLEASE FIX THIS AND RESTORE OUR CONFIDENCE IN USING THIS APP!!
data.replyText: Hi there, thanks for reporting this, it shouldn't be happening. Can you please try deleting and reinstalling the app to see if this resolves the issue? If not, email help@joinproviders.com with more info about the issue and include a screenshot or recording. We'll send some troubleshooting tips and then do our best to investigate the problem.

data.text: Have loved using this app. Super convenient to find out updates and new things going on. This month however i haven't been able to open it successfully, keeps repeating that its unable to load at this time. I uninstalled today and reloading. Was able to open but it is still running very slow.

The only reason I'm giving a 4 star where I would have given 10 if possible. I've been using this app for 4+ years now. The app works great. But after your updates I can't open the app. First time this has ever happened to me. The app is sometimes down and can't update. But within a few minutes it's fine but I've been sitting here looking at that darn orange circle for 20 mins and it won't open. Yes I rebooted my phone, yes I uninstalled and reinstalled. No luck.

Very handy to quickly access benefit amounts. They also have great suggestions. I used a service they recommended to switch to a new health insurance. They were completely unbiased too. Providers also has a debit card, I just got it so not sure how it works but I'm very happy with the app. It's never been down when I needed it and though it takes 10 seconds or so to load my updated fs balance that just tells me they actually checked it first. Very good app.

Was working perfectly fine until a couple months ago. Figured it was something that needed updated, but nothing has changed in 4 months. Now it just constantly says "Providers can't connect to the EBT system right now. Please call the number on the back of your card or visit (site) to check your balance." If the app gets fixed and can connect back to the EBT systems, I will change my review.
data.replyText: Hi there, thanks for reporting this, it shouldn't be happening. Can you please email help@joinproviders.com with more information about the issue and let us know what state you live in? If possible, please include a screenshot of the issue. We'll send some troubleshooting tips and then do our best to investigate the problem. - Francisco

data.text: This app is pretty great. Reliable& so much better than calling every time I need to know my balance. I really like that I can link both my and my boyfriend's cards instead of logging in& out to switch accounts all the time. My only suggestion would be to add features to change the pin, lock the card, & cancel/reorder a new card,which I've heard some other apps have, but those apps crash a lot&aren't very good. I'll stick with Providers& wait for them to come out w/new features in future udates!

This app is a MUST HAVE and Essential for anyone that has an EBT card. The only reason Not to use this app would be lack of a mobile device or just sheer ignorance. The app works great, never had any issues, glitches or errors. There's also a bunch of extra beneficial things offered in the app such as a providers bank account (will not effect your EBT benefits, its a private bank) with access to a virtual card to use before you receive your physical card in the mail, and much more!!

For my purposes, the app works wonderfully, and I have no real complaints about it, only possible improvements. Specifically, it would be helpful for my own record-keeping if the transaction history showed not just the amounts involved in each transaction, but the resulting balance after each transaction. Otherwise, EXTREMELY helpful and convenient.

The app works well and shows the amount I have quickly. I'm pleased with it again. Sometimes it's worth waiting a while with an app and coming back later after a few updates. Update: Thank you for the link to getting a free unlimited min phone! I have trouble paying for mins sometimes so this is great! ♥️ I just received my phone, it's a quality Goggle phone and super easy to set up no more running out of mins because I can't afford data. Nice job providers, thank you!

Love the app. It does what it advertises. I would have gave it a solid 4 or even a 5 star, but they took away the option to get a 250.00 dollar advance loan on your next months direct deposit check. This was the absolute and only reason I went with them. And Im not sure, but if not, it would be great if they reported it to the 3 main credit company's.

The providers app works great for your ebt balance and also has a few decent opportunities and suggestions to offer. However, the addition of surveys is beyond frustrating. I ordered the provider's debit card, received it, and began taking surveys in my spare time. It started off decent but it quickly became impossible to complete even one survey after trying out dozens after dozens of them. It's especially annoying that you will answer a ton of questions prior to being terminated (every time!)

Simple, efficient, accurate, very handy, resourceful, not cluttered with tons of extra junk to maneuver around. A great tool with access at a moments notice, without having to jump through a million hoops to see info (just make sure to refresh your page when you open, or it may not have all transactions included. Thank you

It's very helpful. I can check my balance before & after shopping. some stores registers will decline your purchase if say you only have $83 on your card but you're spending $100. instead of taking the $83 and saying you have a $17 balance you need to pay in cash or credit. and then the cashier will have to know the amount on your card, to type in or it'll decline you again. it's helpful bein able to qwik check your balance without holding up the line having to call and type in your numbers.

I was just looking for a simple app that would tell me my benefits. And Providers does that, but oh boy it does so much more. Banking, a debit card, earlier payments, transaction records, locations/places to use EBT benefits, discounts and coupons, even JOBS NEAR YOU that you can apply for ON THE SPOT. I am absolutely blown away at the capacity of this one app. And yes, they even do non-EBT benefits like SSI and Social Security. It is so convenient, I hope to use this app for a long time!

I am always looking for improvement in this app, but let me state that the " survey" options are beyond frustrating. The worst idea ever when they work so poorly. I have yet to make it to the end of one survey,most of them ask 1 to 10 questions before stating "this is not a good fit"..sure now that I've wasted 10 mins! Or, one of my favorites, it says " we have a perfect survey for you", followed by the page loading for infinity. Don't waste your time. Stick with what do right Providers .
data.replyText: Hello - If you're having trouble with payment y for EBT benefits, please email help@joinproviders.com with more info and let us know what state you live in. We'll share some resources which may be helpful. If you're having trouble with a payment on your Providers Card, email help@providerscard.com and our team will reply in 1 business day.

data.text: The app for its purpose works fine. You have the option to search for work, free phone, or assistance with the internet. It's one or the other, you're not eligible for both. If you're looking for WAH jobs the app offers you information about jobs from home. In addition to that, you have where to find food pantries, assistance with housing, utilities, car, renters, and misc insurance discounts. There's so much more to this app that I appreciate. The plus would help tremendously if this app loads

I don't see when I get my deposit nor the the deposit balance anymore. I DON'T LIKE THAT!!! I live month to month, n I have a poor memory. I want to be able to see how much I spend as well as the date n balance!!! Bring it back. Update 12/14/23 Whatever it was has been fixed. I do like this app. It's the best one I have ever seen for this kind of need. I love all the features in the app very helpful.
data.replyText: Hi there, thanks for reporting this, it shouldn't be happening. Can you please email help@joinproviders.com with more information about the issue and let us know what state you live in? If possible, please include a screenshot of the issue. We'll send some troubleshooting tips and then do our best to investigate the problem. - Francisco

data.text: The app is great, nice not having to call in to get your balance. It also posts updates like when we get a increase from cost of living going up. They're not affiliated with the DHS so you can't modify or renew your benefits on here. You can however track your spending and look at previous deposits. Thank you Providers for this app. Great job, Keep up the good work..

Update: after a few more tries I got it to load and seems to be working great now! ------- Was working really well until this last update. Now it gets stuck on the first load screen (the providers logo) and freezes. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling and all the other things I can think of to troubleshoot. Like another said, happy to change my review when it's fixed. Hoping it's short-term.
data.replyText: Hi there, thanks for reporting this, it shouldn't be happening. If deleting and reinstalling the app doesn't resolve the issue, please email help@joinproviders.com with more info about it and include a screenshot or recording. We'll send some troubleshooting tips and then do our best to investigate the problem.

data.text: With all the EBT fraud happening across the US it would be extremely helpful if there was a "Lock Card" function on this app. That way you could disable the card until you're ready to make a purchase. I also wish it provided a more detailed description of what the purchase was for, and the actual date and time of purchase, it seems to be a very generic generalized description. Sometimes one shopping trip to Walmart results in 1 main charge & 2 smaller charges and there's no further details.

Very cool app! Excellent way to keep up with your food stamp balance as well as the purchases you've made. Plus they keep you up to date on available services and offers for those with a low or fixed income. Everything from coupons , free or discounted E-net or cell phone to help on utilities! This app is a definite must have for anyone receiving government benefits or if you're the primary caregiver of someone receiving benefits. Highly recommend!

This is the best app for jobs in your area , state and government programs , building your credit , insurance for car , grocery stores in your area , Snap balances right away ,ways to rebuild your credit score, and many more different companies and programs , I highly recommend [ providers app to be downloaded on your cell phone or tablet. I just wanna say I really enjoy your app alot , and it gets better every year . Thank you

Great to be able to see my usage and verify the spending on my EBT account and being able to see the amount not having to call everytime I want the amount just login and boom there it is however that being said it does freeze up and say it can't contact my EBT platform for realtime information. that being said I would recommend it to any one looking for the same thing I was

I really like the app. I just lost my card and it was so easy to get a new one. Soooo easy. If I had lost my card with Direct Express, which I have, that was a nightmare I NEVER WANT TO HAVE AGAIN. PROVIDERS IS THE BEST to bank with. Even the automated service is so easy and convenient. I really like this way of banking with them.☺️

Overall, I love the app because it gives a lot of information about different ways to save money. However, I'm having trouble connecting to my state's EBT portal or trying to clip coupons to my loyalty cards. The app worked fine until it had to be updated. Now I can't clip any of my Food Lion coupons, just goes around in that "loading" circle. I have no issues with the Dollar General coupons. Please help. Thanks.

Great app... Except it is not working anymore, at least not for me. For the last few months every time I open the app it gives a whole page of numbers and error codes. It has alibi that says "Send info" that you click and then can send an email about the error to whoever. We'll I've done that multiple times over these last 2 months and the app still doesn't work for me. Uninstall, clear cache, etc.. Still not a working app as of right now for me. However when it does work it's very handy.

I love this app! It auto-refreshes when opened to show the current EBT balance, with the date, amount, and store of my last transaction. It shows the amount and date of the last few deposits to the card. You can do your banking, it has links to special offers, like how to get free phones or service, job listings, coupons, recipes, and lots of other stuff. And I've not had a problem with it yet. I highly recommend!

Was a great app at first because it had a shopping list. I could make my list based on ad prices or prices I knew well enough to estimate. I knew before I got to the store if I was within my budget. Loved It! Then the shopping list was eliminated for "new offerings". Nothing new has been offered. In my opinion, app is now useless. I can get my balance by calling the online number. USELESS APP! Don't waste your time on it.
data.replyText: Hi Peggy, thank you for the feedback. We appreciate you sharing your experience with the shopping list feature and will do our best to take future changes into consideration.

data.text: If you have food stamps and/or money assistance, download this app. You will no longer have to save that last receipt or call the number on the back of the card to get your balance. Just setup the app which takes less than 2 minutes, and each time you launch it, it checks your balance(s) for you, food and cash. It tracks account deposits, and spending each month, plus offers loads of ways to save, plus special offers. Extremely convenient, and very easy to setup and use.

I believe the apps is a great concept and it can be good resource beyond checking your balance; knowing how much you spent as a way to budget your food benefits to last. The only two issues I have is the constant updates or system unavailable, which is likely due to the amount of individuals collecting benefits. My second issue is, they did not notify me that my car warranty is about to expire....

The app has improved quite a bit since it's inception, which is saying alot. Although, the abundant of offers they boast aren't always as great as they sound, but some are worth checking out. Unfortunately, some of the FREE offers aren't free at all and end up costing you more than if you were to just outright purchase them yourself. In reiteration, the app has improved and hopefully with upcoming updates will improve even more.

Always has my most recent balance, down to the minute, lots of helpful tips and links, plus the gov't paycheck feature looks promising. Downsides-I'd like to see the future/pending deposits, have an appt reminder for recerts & appts regarding benefits, and where the money was spent updated faster. I've heard there's a card lock feature, but I've not found it. If they don't have it, it'd be a great feature. Wish it was easier to navigate, bc if there's a card lock feature, I haven't found it.

I have to say this was one of my favorite apps. I loved the simplicity of it all. It had great resource information, coupons, and quick access to my food balance. It showed updates as far as pandemic and changes made to our balance, job listings. Help available for everyone. It was awesome. Now its totally changed and i tried for over an hour to create account or whatever they were wanting...Huge waste of my time. Couldn't log in and after the huge hassle i dont want to even bother. Y Y Y??
data.replyText: Hi Donna, thanks for your message. Providers is the new and updated version of the app, which includes a feature to sign up for a debit card. Please note this is entirely optional and you don't have to use the card in order to use the app. Please email help@joinproviders.com for more info about the app, the card, or any other doubts. - Francisco

data.text: This app is a convenient tool for keeping track of my balance. It keeps a detailed log of when, where, and how much you've spent. My frustrations with this app are that it frequently has issues with updating my balance. At other times it just doesn't load anything at all and says an issue has occured or the system is unavailable until a certain time. Overall, it's useful. Hopefully they can fix the app so it functions properly for everyone.

It's slow and difficult to navigate. It was unnecessary to change the old version because it was basic and easy and ran a lot quicker; IT WAS SIMPLE !!! The new version doesn't work just as well as the old version. The access to personal information it was uncalled for!!! RATE: 0 stars Side Note: You're better off calling to get the updated balance.

App is terrible. Worked well for a couple of months, then royally malfuntioned. Made large grocery purchase that it never reflected. A few days later, I made another purchase and it didn't show. Two to three weeks later, it still showed no change to my balance, so I had to use the automated phone option. It also listed next deposit as $16 and change. Still getting maximum benefits as part of the stimulus, and after they deposited, it still showed $16 pending for that date! Uninstalling!

im giving it a 5 stars because when this app works properly its great. this issue is that it often cannot connect and has a red alert on the top of the screen. this can last anywhere from hours to 2 weeks even. deleting the app and reinstalling it does not help at all. updating the app does not help. once it does this you're at the mercy of the app and however long it takes to connect again.

App doesnt even work anymore. "next" button is completely useless and doesnt advance anything to the next screen. it's not on my end, either! tried reinstalling the app, using data and wifi, and several different locations. the app just decided to break and i can no longer get past the starting screen or log on. pointless. this only happened after the most recent "bug fix" update as well. yeah you sure fixed it alright.

Sorry to say, but- if something's not broken, why fix it? 😔 The previous format/layout was more compacted in segments, more eye-friendly, with a lot of white space around each segment, making it easier to read & check out at a glance. Now, it has depressing black background & all these random color blotches,-everything runs together, making it unpleasant & hard to track & find what you're looking for. It's not nearly as organized, neatly compacted, & readable with white background like before.

Actually a super helpful app. It lists up to date balance information for your EBT card(s), with details of transaction/payment history, ect. And there are multiple tools within the app, to link you with different programs that can help you with a multitude of other things you may need. It's a simple layout, and I find it much more convenient than calling for my balance. Definitely recommend.

So handy. I was always losing my last reciept with my current balance, or having to call the automated system and enter my card number to get my balance which was just a pain. Seeing my balance also helps me budget better in an attempt to make my benefits last through the month, though I don't know anyone that is able to do that. The app works great, it doesn't update my balance automatically, though that's not a big deal. I appreciate the money saving coupons provided as well. Thank you!

I used to be able to get a balance, and a list of transactions and a graph comparing spending, etc. All in a minute. Now,,,,, it only gives me the current updated balance, that takes 3 minutes to load, it gives me my last transaction ,,,2 days ago. Not very efficient. I'm not sure if these app providers get scammed into letting someone "upgrade" their system, or if they screwed it up all by themselves. It would be nice to be able to get my balance,and my last 10 transactions.
data.replyText: Hi there, thanks for reporting this, it shouldn't be happening. Can you please email help@joinproviders.com with more information about the issue and let us know what state you live in? If possible, please include a screenshot of the issue. We'll send some troubleshooting tips and then do our best to investigate the problem. - Francisco

data.text: This used to be a great app. You could view your benefits etc easily. Since the upgrade, it is hard to find any of your info, other than your balance. It's so "busy" and full of ads. It's not user friendly like it used to be. About the only thing I can easily find on here is ads for free cell phone service and my current benefit balance, and considering how long it takes to refresh now, I'm not even sure that's accurate. I still end up calling.

Frustrating and beyond horrible. I don't know if the glitches extend to the entire system, but for CA, it SUCKS! Not sure if it's an interface issue or something else, but EVERY time I try to login it kicks me out with an error message telling me to enter my Card & SUID Numbers again. When I do that, it prompts me to create a new account which then spins me to another error saying that there's already an account w/ that info. Waste of time!!

I miss the Fresh EBT version. For me, it always worked and accurately showed all my transactions. This new one does not and because it doesn't, I end up having to call anyway. So what good is that for me? Going to give it another month as I am hoping this is just a transitional issue and will be resolved. They sure added a whole bunch of extra stuff I don't even want, but how about fixing the basics -- you know, so I can see an accurate transaction listing with an accurate/matching balance?

Sometimes I can't view all my transactions. Even after reloading the app even days after the problem first arises and says it can't load my transactions and yo try later, sometimes it still won't load. It does at least have the balance and refreshes to check every time you open the app. It's helpful and convenient to have the app for the card. Most of the "offers" were helpful to me, though one it suggests is not available in all states and I don't qualify, so just keep a look out.

Makes everything so much easier! The convenience is great! check balances, upcoming deposits and track spending all right at your fingertips. No hassle in having to call and wait on the phone for just a balance. Plus! They offer other awesome resources like online grocery shopping with EBT plus delivery options! Help with feeding your family, a phone if you need one and I just found out via this app that Amazon takes EBT! Love it!!!

This is so very helpful! I love all of the tips and advice too, like, how you can get Amazon Prime, with free music, shows, and books, etc, for free the first month, and for $5.99 a month after that! Many other deals and programs offered as well, too, including help with pets, for their health care, neutering, and even food sometimes. Even helps with savings, coupons, etc. Plus, keeps you up to date on your current balance, as well as your spending. It's a great app, I definitely recommend 💯😊

It is so irritating to open the app and never know your balance! It is constantly "refreshing", and just spins in circles! That doesn't help me at all! I also do not like not seeing my deposits on my card! That needs to be added back instead of just out spending. Very disappointed, and I use the app almost daily. Now it's a complete waste, and not even "usable"!

The app itself seems to be alright: easy to sign up, balance is generally accurate. The only issue is that about 90% of the time, it cannot connect to my EBT card to find the recent transactions. Almost every single time I use the app, it will give me the "your balance is correct but your recent transactions are not" message. It very, very rarely ever works. This one issue alone is bad enough to make me knock it down from 5 stars to 3 stars.

EBT doesn't show available funds balance on home screen. It shows only original monthly that were deposited funds :( . But it seems you are pushing the use of the Debit Card, but do not show that there are fees you have to pay for each transaction ☹ SHAMEFUL not to be upright about it, it is free to agree to sign up for it, but it is NOT free to use it. BE AWARE AND READ THE FINE PRINT ! It used to be a fine app...not anymore, it cannot be trusted :(

I've had this app for years now and I had benefits in 2 different states and I was still able to use this app. Super easy to use and is so much better than having to do the aggravating calls multiple times to check my snap balance. Honestly every once in a while the app will glitch and won't show the balance and the app will tell you it's having trouble connecting to your states portal. This rarely happens though and nothing is perfect, still hasn't stopped me from using the app in any way.

EDIT 9/26/21: Ever since this app switched to "Providers" it won't update my balance. Always says it can't connect to my state's system. Waste of space now. OLD APP WAS BETTER: Anyone with EBT/Snap/Lonestar can certainly appreciate an app that lists your balance without you having to call. It's slightly annoying that it takes forever to connect and doesn't keep a constant current update. It would be amazing to see a running balance & transactions.

I love this app! I have found it to be very useful...I can quickly check my food-stamp balance prior to shopping. There's no longer a need to remember to save your receipt to see what your FS balance is, or worse... having to call and input your card number. All you need to do is open the app, wait for it to quickly refresh and then you can see what your remaining balance is! If you receive both FS's and Cash benefits, it will show the balance for each of them, plus other helpful info!

This app went from being the best to the shittest app just by one update they did that changed the whole app. Doesnt ever want to load and when it does most of the time it's not the right balance. Doesnt matter if you use cell service or Wi-Fi still doesn't load. Wish they didn't change it I miss how it use to be. I also miss when they use to have a shopping list part on the app. You type in what your getting and the price and at the bottom it would tell you how much your gonna be spending.

Since the app changed from FreshEBT to Providers, I've had nothing but problems. I'm a pretty tech savvy girl, so that's not the issue. My problems are similar to those reported by many other reviewers here. I loved the simplicity of FreshEBT, but I doubt I'll get that now. If the bugs in the Providers app aren't dealt with, I'll probably have to switch to a pad and pen. Like, an actual pad of paper and an actual ink pen. Whoa!

I used to love this app, but the last couple of months I have been unable to get my balance without getting the "Unable to connect to your state"(Washington state) error. I have cleared to cache, the storage, even completely uninstalled, rebooted my phone and reinstalled. After that it worked... Once. This is utterly ridiculous. Please fix this app or direct us to a secure and reliable app that does what this one used to.

HORRIBLE! It's slow and continuously loads the bottom of the screen. The bottom of the screen keeps alerting me that's it's unable to load. There's annoying repetitive prompts to sign up for a providers debit card. The app is too focused on "forcing" you to sign up for a debit card all while not being focused on what it's supposed to be focused on, which is giving me my EBT balance! The balance just buffers continuously. Neverending. Was more user friendly beforehand. It's uninstalled now!

This app is absolutely necessary if you receive SNAP/ WIC and/Cash aid. It makes it so much easier to track your balance, and you can track your spending using it, it even will break down the monthly expenses (that it has the information for anyway) and will make a pie chart with it. There was a bug for a while where it wouldn't display past spending and sometimes it slows down (I'm guessing its at times when there's high traffic through the state's portal).

I absolutely LOVE this app. It saves so much time & is extremely easy to use. It not only gives you your balance & keeps track of spending, it lets you build a shopping list. The later saves tons of time because you can add & delete from it monthly. As most people tend to buy many of the same things every month, this saves you the headache & time of making a new grocery list.

Its always there when i need to check my benefit balance at the push of a button.. Its fast, reliable and helpful with support and places i can go to for help with almost anything if you need it, and all of the information that this app provides is right at the tip of my finger with the push of just one button... I LOVE IT!! THANK YOU FRESH EBT!!

Edit: This app used to be all of the below review until I updated my phone. I had no problems making a new account on my ipad but trying to log in with the same creditials as I made on my ipad gets me nowhete. It's frustrating as I do not carry my ipad with me at all times. This is why I changed my rating from 5 stars to 1 star. This app is so helpful for me. I don't have to keep receipts and I don't have to go through the automated number to get my balance. Quicker and easier usage is a plus.
data.replyText: Hi there, thank you for your message. I'm sorry to hear you're having so much trouble with the app, this shouldn't be the case. If you email help@joinproviders.com with more information about the issue and let us know what state you live in, we'll send you some troubleshooting steps.- Francisco

data.text: This app works pretty much as intended. The only real issues I've had has been in the last couple of years when I've gotten new phones and had to reload the app, it had been Very difficult to reconnect with my account. I've had to change username and passwords to get back into the app which is frustrating. Otherwise, very convenient!

I like that the app lets me know I have a deposit transactions to look forward to. It would be great if I could change password, freeze card use, report lost card or request a new card, like some other apps claim to. I tried, but I like this app for transaction history & deposits to my card. Thank you!

FIX THE APP! Even with the update it don't open an still can't send info! 24 hrs later still won't open an still no answer from customer service either! What's wrong with Providers app? The app WILL NOT OPEN! It goes to send info with bunch different numbers an when I click send info it won't submit. I can't even get in the app to see what's in my providers card to use because I'm afraid it's not the right amount of money!
data.replyText: Hi there, thanks for reporting this, it shouldn't be happening. Can you please try deleting and reinstalling the app to see if this resolves the issue? If not, email help@joinproviders.com with more info about the issue and include a screenshot or recording. We'll send some troubleshooting tips and then do our best to investigate the problem.

data.text: this app has a lot to offer. the new paid surveys is an awesome addition. pays out instantly to a virtual providers card, as well as the physical providers card, which they send to you free. there is nothing I can complain about honestly.

This app worked great until 2.28.24. Now it times itself out and brings up a 'send info' page/link regarding the error that doesn't work. I've deleted and reinstalled it and cleared the cache. It's still not working correctly. It's become a huge problem.
data.replyText: Hi there, thanks for reporting this, it shouldn't be happening. Can you please try deleting and reinstalling the app to see if this resolves the issue? If not, email help@joinproviders.com with more info about the issue and include a screenshot or recording. We'll send some troubleshooting tips and then do our best to investigate the problem.

data.text: The Providers app makes it very convenient, and easier to check one EBT balance without having to call. Also, the Providers app offers ways to shop with your EBT card online at major name stores, while you save money, and reap the benefits the EBT card has to offer. And last but least the Providers app keeps you updated on all Benefit changes, Job offerings, Food banks, Tax info, and etc.

Issues since 1/24 update. The app will not load. There is a "send info" link that also doesn't load. Please fix this. I use this app regularly. I have done all the normal troubleshooting except for clearing the data or uninstall/reinstalling because I am afraid if I do, I won't be able to log back in.
data.replyText: Hi there, thanks for reporting this, it shouldn't be happening. Can you please try deleting and reinstalling the app to see if this resolves the issue? If not, email help@joinproviders.com with more info about the issue and include a screenshot or recording. We'll send some troubleshooting tips and then do our best to investigate the problem.

data.text: Unable to even open the app anymore as of two days ago. It's has a link that says I can send info but it doesn't work at all either. Please fix your app. I have a Motorola g stylus 5g.... Update:::: app is still doing the same thing. I will provide screenshot of what I get when opening the app to the email provided.
data.replyText: Hi there, thanks for reporting this, it shouldn't be happening. Can you please try deleting and reinstalling the app to see if this resolves the issue? If not, email help@joinproviders.com with more info about the issue and include a screenshot or recording. We'll send some troubleshooting tips and then do our best to investigate the problem.

data.text: I used this app all the time however the past at least 2 months it doesn't load. It shows the icon/logo then says a bunch of letters and numbers and says can't load right now press send info and will fix asap. So idk what's happened to it but I wish it would fix bc I loved the app when it worked.
data.replyText: Hello! I'm really sorry that the app isn't loading for you. Our team is currently investigating this issue. If this bug is still happening, please text us at 914-677-1736 with a description of what you’re seeing, and we’ll try to help figure out what’s going on. - Francisco

data.text: The app used to would fine. Now, all of a sudden, I updated the app, when I login, there is a white screen with numbers and a link that says send info. The link doesn't work. The app no longer works.
data.replyText: Hi there, thanks for reporting this, it shouldn't be happening. Can you please try deleting and reinstalling the app to see if this resolves the issue? If not, email help@joinproviders.com with more info about the issue and include a screenshot or recording. We'll send some troubleshooting tips and then do our best to investigate the problem.

data.text: I have updated this app on 2 different phones. Uninstalled and reinstalled, and it won't load. There is something very wrong with this app. And I'm not the only person who's having this issue. Plz fix, or I'm done with this app and deleted permanently.
data.replyText: Hello, we’ve recently worked on resolving this issue. Can you please upgrade the app to the latest version and see if this resolves the issue? If not, try deleting and reinstalling the app after upgrading. Finally, if none of this works, email us at help@joinproviders.com with more info and we'll look further into this issue. - Francisco

data.text: App doesn't load. Error codes after error codes or just a screen of code sometimes it just shows an orange and nothing else. I like how it seems to change up on the manner in which it fails yet never actually succeeds. What's the point in this app again?
data.replyText: Hello, sorry to hear about this issue. Our team is currently investigating it and trying to resolve it. If this bug is still happening for you, please text us at 914 677-1736 with a description of what you’re seeing, and we’ll try to help figure out what’s going on.- Francisco

data.text: Having issues with getting the app to open for the past two days and I keep getting a message to send info on and when I try to tap it nothing happens. Not sure if you are aware of this problem, but it would be nice to see if it could be fixed.
data.replyText: Hi there, thanks for reporting this, it shouldn't be happening. Can you please try deleting and reinstalling the app to see if this resolves the issue? If not, email help@joinproviders.com with more info about the issue and include a screenshot or recording. We'll send some troubleshooting tips and then do our best to investigate the problem.

data.text: Always having problems connecting to Florida portal. Not good. Its ok when it works, but i wish there was another portal that you all could go through so we can check our balance. 😢😢 Now since the update, it wont load at all. It just sits there & does nothing. 🤬🤬🤬

Yall getting worse every time now it doesn't show my amount of my ebt its showing crazy numbers that it is not my account y'all need to fix this problem asap. It keep saying App couldn't load this is every day when I put the app since I uodate twice this keep saying the same thing. It take real long time to show crazy numbers
data.replyText: Hello, sorry to hear about this issue. Our team is currently investigating it and trying to resolve it. If this bug is still happening for you, please text us at 914 677-1736 with a description of what you’re seeing, and we’ll try to help figure out what’s going on.- Francisco

data.text: Most useful app ever made. I use Providers more than most apps I have. It helps me to budget the money I get for Snap. I dont know how I will feed myself and kids when the FDA stops our pandemic extra allotment. I guess its back to eating expired dry goods and breads and the unhealthy salt-filled canned goods from the food pantry. Where those who also struggle to feed themselves, dump what they don't want on us. What happens to the billions that supposedly get donated?

This app is absolute garbage!! It logs you out saying your password has expired, tells you to pick a new one than when you do & try to log in with a new password it tells you it's no good & after a few attempts it locks you out of your account! Totally nonsense considering I shouldn't have been told my password I've had for like a year is now expired! Avoid this app at all cost, it's garbage would give a zero rating if I could!!!
data.replyText: Hi there, thanks for reporting this, it shouldn't be happening. Can you please email help@joinproviders.com with more information about the issue and let us know what state you live in? If possible, please include a screenshot of the issue. We'll send some troubleshooting tips and then do our best to investigate the problem. - Francisco

data.text: This always helps me keep on track. They also now offer banking with them and that's very nice. This app always keeps me up to date on resources specific to my state, as well as job opportunities, and other services not always seen but offered by the state for support if it's needed.

Lately they've added a survey feature with the mobile banking. I've made 175 bucks in a week periodically taking surveys! The ease of access to the funds is perfect as you can cash out with a penny or $100. I can't recommend this more for anyone trying to earn some extra funds! I feel super blessed from them adding this feature and can sleep a little better at night knowing I can bundle up a decent amount of money by taking surveys while watching TV, it's GREAT!

Pretty informative and helpful app overall. Just be prepared to get very upset if you do surveys. I've done several myself and have gotten paid for several and had several I completed and didn't get paid for. There's a spot where you can let them know this but nothing ever gets done about it. I've also completed surveys, and at the end of it, it pops up that I didn't qualify for it. So just be prepared to have some time to waste because it happens alot. If it weren't for that I'd give 5 stars

I've used Providers years now. The app has definitely grown in useful ways to access resources and even allows instant payout for surveys. My deposit arrives earlier than any other bank I've ever used. Your connect with Plaid which was integrated quickly. A couple of requests recycle your virtual card without customer service and maybe a little overdraft cushion for direct deposit recipients. Oh and the fact that every month my forecasted deposit date has always been correct. Thanks!

When it works it's great but I've completed surveys and was failed to be re-embursed for the reward I earned. They try to make you aware in the initial disclaimer that that might happen even though it's specifically says that you shouldn't or won't be kicked out of a survey after answering a few questions but it happens anyway however it is functional for the most part it's not perfect

its broken won't load and the send info button is also broken so dont even ask update::: was taking a screenshot of the broken app won't load page and it loaded just as i took the screenshot UPDATE!!! working with support but have found if you ignore the error message and continue to wait it will eventually load
data.replyText: Hello, sorry to hear about this issue. Our team is currently investigating it and trying to resolve it. If this bug is still happening for you, please text us at 914 677-1736 with a description of what you’re seeing, and we’ll try to help figure out what’s going on.- Francisco

data.text: So since the adding of surveys it's been a frustrating app. It was super cool at first to earn a few dollars. But now I can never get paid as as soon as I answer all the questions it will say I didn't qualify. Since I use a different app to earn doing surveys I know they are kicking us out right as it's finished. So they are simply getting free completed surveys without having to pay people. It sucks since I would guess 90% of us are the poorest of the poor. Not cool to take advantage.

Such a awesome app !!! Great and easy way to check your EBT balance . Very user friendly navigation. And they put some many available services and discounts that are specifically for People/families that qualify for EBT, like discounts for mobile phone service,internet, food delivery,child care support even streaming movies apps!!! And so much more, plus it's updated frequently so there is bound to be something for everyone located all on one app!!! It's been a heaven sent for my family and I.

Wont load- At ALLLL now.. glitchy when it used to. Same Exact issues as other reviews stating- AFTER it FAILS, it says "send info", but even THAT button wont work. Hellooo- Terrible!! My original 5Star review just became a 1.
data.replyText: Hello, thanks for your message. Our team is currently investigating this issue. If this bug is still happening for you, please text us at 914 677-1736 with a description of what you’re seeing, and we’ll try to help figure out what’s going on. - Francisco

data.text: this app is a very well produced app, except it lacks certain items that could most certainly make it superb. I have always had my reservations about the suggestion box idea/review because it usually serves to enrichen others without providing an appropriate compensation for patentable ideas. C.D.Z.J. (Texas).)

This is a must have app if you get SNAP benefits, and cash benefits from DHS as well. I love the convenience of checking my balance. There are a ton of resources including free stuff, phones, computers, even jobs. This app keeps you updated on any changes or other news about your benefits. You can even track what you bought and what you paid using your SNAP card. This is the best app I have in my arsenal!

It's extremely useful but now I can't open the app at all it just sends me to a error screen n send the code but I not only can't send the code I think the app completely crashs I can't use the app at all now I don't know if it's just ann error on my end or if the app isn't working at all at the moment I really want to go back to using this app it's basically my only way to see how much is on my card

When it comes to checking your balance it is a awesome. However, the paid survey part is F*****G HORRIBLE!!!! Since they launched that part i was only able to complete successfully 5 surveys. After that EVERY SINGLE TIME AND I MEAN EVERY SINGLE TIME I'VE TRIED TO COMPLETE A SURVEY, even if it says best match, i get kicked out! Do you know how frustrating that is?!!? Please FIX IT

I bought a new phone and tried to connect it to the providers app, but was told that the answers to my security questions were all wrong. I know they were not. I even deleted and reinstalled the stupid app. If I could give it 0 stars I would. You've heard of Cash App? Well this has become "trash app".
data.replyText: Hi there, unfortunately some states require users to enter the same exact security answer used while setting up their account - including capitalization, spacing, punctuation, etc. - and don't provide a clear way to reset it. If you email help@joinproviders.com and let us know your state, we'll provide account reset tips which may help. - Francisco

data.text: For the past four months now every time I want to check my balance I get the spinning wheel of death & then "we are having problems connecting with your states system". I can understand that if it happens once, but every day for four months, bull!!!!! Oh & now they offer surveys all of which I don't qualify for, surprise, surprise
data.replyText: Hi there, thanks for reporting this, it shouldn't be happening. Can you please email help@joinproviders.com with more information about the issue and let us know what state you live in? If possible, please include a screenshot of the issue. We'll send some troubleshooting tips and then do our best to investigate the problem. - Francisco

data.text: The app hasn't worked to show my balance since before December 2023. It always says it can't reach my states system. It WAS a great app but idk what happened. Very disappointing!
data.replyText: Hi there, thank you for your message. I'm sorry to hear you're having so much trouble with the app, this shouldn't be the case. If you email help@joinproviders.com with more information about the issue and let us know what state you live in, we'll send you some troubleshooting steps.- Francisco

data.text: Not all the features work. The job section is not frequently updated. The most of the jobs are fake. Usually, the jobs are posted by job agencies with the only purpose of getting your information, get you as a customer and selling your data to third party companies. Usually, they are just scammers. They only thing you will get is a tone of junk mails via text or email. Provider Developers should help us better protecting us from these haslers. Once your identity is compromised...
data.replyText: Hello - I’m sorry to hear you're having trouble with an offer or job posting. We work hard to vet our partners to ensure our users are safe, and only see the best opportunities & deals. Please email us at help@joinproviders.com with more information and include a screenshot of what you are seeing so we can look into it further. - Francisco

data.text: Works very well no problems or issues so far I've had it for several months and I use it multiple times per day. The paid survey option is my literal favorite as finances are very touch & go right now. Instant payout feature is such a blessing as I can get gas or food when we need it. Thank you providers for this app I am extremely grateful for it!
